data.title: Sorting music by length of the song
data.text:
After going through the internet, I am not able to find the answer to this. I have over 3000 songs on Apple Music and I am trying to figure out how to sort music by the length of the song. I do not know the name of the song that I’m searching for but I know it’s the longest song out of all of them. Can someone help me with this?

Hello Luiscuevas1996,

​Thank you for using the Apple Support Communities. We see you have a question about sorting content in the Music app for iOS, and we'll be happy to provide an answer.

This resource covers sorting options: View albums, playlists, and more in Music on iPhone

"Sort your music

Tap Library, then tap Playlists, Albums, Songs, TV & Movies, or Music Videos.

Tap Sort, then choose a sorting method, such as title, artist, recently added, or recently played."

While it's not possible to sort by song length on iOS, you can always send your suggestion to Apple here: Product Feedback

As an alternative, if you use iTunes or the macOS Music app, you should be able to sort by song length there. You would do this by opening the Songs view from the Library options, and then clicking the "Time" field.

We hope that helps.

Take care.
